title: Live: Australia takes on India as Test series begins in Pune
text:
For and against penalty rate changes By Jessica Haynes 
What are the arguments for and against to cut Sunday penalty rates for some hospitality, retail and fast-food workers? By business reporter Michael Janda 
Sunday workers are not only employees, they're also customers. So what effect do you think stripping thousands of dollars from their pay will have on already fragile consumer spending? Workers have their say on penalty rate pay cuts By Mark Reddie 
The Fair Work Commission has announced cuts to penalty rates. We hear from the retail and hospitality workers that will be affected by the cuts. By political reporter Jane Norman 
The Federal Government's renewable energy target has proved a headache for Malcolm Turnbull, but what exactly is the RET and what is it hoped to achieve? Top Stories
